title: My Wife is Stifling My Dreams
description:
Amy and Adam have worked through many marital issues, but they are still in disagreement over how much time Adam can spend on the hobby that he's been passionate about since their dating days. - Dr. Laura: "Be supportive of your husband's dreams, and you'll have a better man on your hands."

What hobby or passion does your spouse wish you'd support? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura
